nodes.text: Custodian of the Paths was a title within the Nihil pirate organization held by the Eye of the Nihil. The title referred to the secret hyperspace Paths the Nihil had access to, and the Custodian's duties were to safeguard and dole out information on the Paths. Asgar Ro and his son Marchion, who successively held the title of Eye of the Nihil, were also Custodians of the Paths.
